titles: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Die Martis, 30. Martii 1647. That the two Houses of Parliament having received information of a dangerous petition, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Baily,
notes: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Expressing their disapproval of "a petition tending to put the army into a distemper and mutiny."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Petition of right --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
